main event: Police officers in Cocoa, Florida reported observing unidentified flying objects in the sky on August 3, 1965.
interesting points: The objects were described as round, orange, and appeared to maneuver and change positions.
The Air Force investigated the sightings and determined the lights were reflections caused by a cold air mass refracting ground lights.
No unusual aircraft were found to be in the area at the time of the sightings.
The Air Force said they would question the police officers who reported the observations.
The unidentified objects were seen by several witnesses over the course of about an hour.
